bike.description: NEW Fuji Altair 2 custom butted aluminum with PoweCurve down tube, Tri shaped top tube, Oversized seat tube and Integrated head tube, double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: Fuji Altair 2, custom butted aluminum with Edge S-bend MonoStay, Cold forged dropout with CNC D disc mount and replaceable hanger

components.description: Rock Shox Tora SL 29 Air w/Turn Key LO and 80mm Travel
TruVativ Power Spline w/ Cartridge sealed bearing
Wellgo ATB w/steel cage, toe clips and straps
WTB SpeedDisc AM 29"  DW w/ Single Eyelet 32H
Avid Elixir 5 Hydraulic Disc, 160R/185F mm rotor
V.P. A-42E 1 1/8" Press Fit Integrated, 30mm spacers
Fuji CGC Riser 15mm double butted aluminum 31.8mm
Fuji CGC Ultalite Forged Alloy +/- 7 degree
Fuji CGC Forged Al micro adjust, 350mm
Fuji Superlite Alloy QR, 34.9mm Laser Etched
